data.title: Experience 4x Faster Upgrade to Databricks Unity Catalog with Impetus - Data + AI Summit 2024
data.meta_description: Databricks Unity Catalog enables effective data governance strategies, which are essential for unlocking the full potential of your data and AI assets while ensuring compliance, security, and collaboration. However, migrating to the Unity Catalog can present challenges such as technical complexities and maintaining security. Join us on June 12 at 3:40 PM PT to discover how the Impetus Unity Catalog Migration Accelerator can overcome these challenges. This Databricks Brickbuilder Accelerator simplifies data asset migration, ensures seamless identity transitions, and enhances security management, significantly reducing time-to-market and maintaining operational integrity. Learn how this powerful accelerator can streamline your transition to unified data governance, empowering your organization to drive innovation and achieve business growth with unparalleled efficiency.
data.text:
Databricks Unity Catalog enables effective data governance strategies, which are essential for unlocking the full potential of your data and AI assets while ensuring compliance, security, and collaboration. However, migrating to the Unity Catalog can present challenges such as technical complexities and maintaining security. Join us on June 12 at 3:40 PM PT to discover how the Impetus Unity Catalog Migration Accelerator can overcome these challenges. This Databricks Brickbuilder Accelerator simplifies data asset migration, ensures seamless identity transitions, and enhances security management, significantly reducing time-to-market and maintaining operational integrity. Learn how this powerful accelerator can streamline your transition to unified data governance, empowering your organization to drive innovation and achieve business growth with unparalleled efficiency.
